title: 开服的时候报错
author: Dashashou
txt_content:
[23:25:02] [Server thread/WARN] [FML/]: =============================================================
[23:25:02] [Server thread/WARN] [FML/]: MOD HAS DIRECT REFERENCE System.exit() THIS IS NOT ALLOWED REROUTING TO FML!

能解决吗   看到报错就不顺眼

replies.author: zlzchuyue
replies.txt_content: mod服基本都有这个，完全不用理会，不会出问题的
